attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for a Member of Parliament to tell a lie to the public or Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make it a criminal offence for any MP to lie or deliberately mislead the public or Parliament. This would be in line with the requirements of other professional bodies such as lawyers or doctors and ensure that the integrity of MP's is not only maintained but also provide the public with confidence that all MP's behaviour is to the highest professional standards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
